name: raythompsonwebdev-com
description: Hi. I'm a starter theme called raythompsonwebdev-com, or underscores, if you like. I'm a theme meant for hacking so don't use me as a Parent Theme. Instead try turning me into the next, most awesome, WordPress theme out there. That's what I'm here for.
author: Automattic Theme Team

scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../raythompsonwebdev-com.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.js .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json .babelrc .editorconfig .eslintrc.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist sass style.css.map style.min.css.map editor-style.css.map .sass-cache .prettierrc.json fonts .vscode
